title: Coronation Street's Sue Cleaver displays impressive weight loss in sexy plunging suit
text:

Coronation Street star Sue Cleaver looked incredible in a sexy plunging suit as she showed off the results of her recent three stone weight loss.

The actress, who plays Eileen Grimshaw in the ITV soap, looked worlds away from her unlucky-in-love character as she enjoyed a night out with her co-stars.

Sue, who has been in the show for 19 years, looked every inch the glamour puss as she posed up at the When You Wish Upon A Star annual Black and White Ball at the Hallmark Hotel in Manchester.

Sue, 56, teamed her glam trouser suit with a plunging top and animal print heels, and wore her blonde hair in curls.

She looked gorgeous as she posed for a snap with Daniel Brocklebank (Billy), Julie Goudling (Shona) and Rob Mallard (Daniel).

(Image: Dave Nelson)

(Image: Dave Nelson)

The actress has been involved with When You Wish Upon A Star for many years, regularly volunteering at their annual Winter Wonderland event which sees Wish families enjoy a Christmas weekend away together at at Center Parcs.

Earlier this year it was reported that away from the famous cobbles Sue was thought to have lost three stone and dropped from a size 16 to a size 12 to 14 after cutting out gluten and following a low-sugar Mediterranean diet.

In 2011 it was reported that Sue, who studied at the Manchester Metropolitan School of Theatre, collapsed on set in 2011 due to her diabetes and was rushed to hospital for treatment.

"Sue was always a self-confessed foodie, who admitted that over-indulgence was her Achilles Heel. Now everything’s changed," a source previously told Woman magazine.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: Getty Images)

Sue, who is diabetic, reportedly switched to a healthy lifestyle so she can enjoy a longer life with her partner and son Elliot.

Last year her character was devastated to discover that her husband Pat Phelan was a serial killer, and her recent romance with builder Jan Lozinski also headed for disaster.

Eileen was devastated when she thought her boyfriend was part of a human trafficking ring but it turned out that Jan, played by Piotr Baumann, was a police informant working undercover to successfully expose the operation.

He was dramatically shot by trafficker Rachel Healy but discharged himself from hospital and quietly slipped away after Sean Tully warned him to leave Eileen alone.

(Image: WireImage)

Her sons Jason and Todd have both fled the street, and the only constant in her chequered life is her pal, Street Cars boss Steve McDonald.

Julia, who is expecting her first baby, showed off her baby bump on the red carpet in a chic black dress and heels.

This year’s theme was A Night At The Musicals and celebs gathered to raise money to grant wishes to children with life threatening illnesses across the north west.
